meanings.definition: A red synthetic dye used in food coloring.
meanings.sent1: The erythrosines added a bright red color to the cake.
meanings.sent2: Food manufacturers use erythrosines to make candies look more appealing.
meanings.sent3: The erythrosines in the frosting made the cupcakes look like they were blushing.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks turned as red as erythrosines when she was embarrassed.
meanings.sent5: The erythrosines in the drink made it look like liquid fire.
